My simple board computer is unfortunately not able to calculate the paths for the FTL-Drive. Because despite the processing unit in the FTL even more accurate data for control and course calculation is needed, and I have to compensate (in)logic and effects of quantum mechanics. That's why I created an upgrade and used a powerfull quantum computer as cpu.
I also fixed some problems the first version had. For example the message 'Your spaceship is open' also points out were it is open.
More notes for usage are available at the entry of the board computer.
Dependent on the color of the housing each board computer as another graphic user interface.
